text:
[Verse]
City lights the road that glows
Never end where time just slows
Night is young the world is ours
Follow stars chase the towers

[Verse 2]
Engine hums in neon streets
Feel the beat in every seat
Windows down the wind it sings
Freedom found in midnight's wings

[Chorus]
Drive all night into the dawn
Keep the dream we're holding on
Moon and stars they guide the way
In the dark we'll find the day

[Verse 3]
Miles to go with friends so near
Laughing loud no trace of fear
Highway calls let's feel alive
Every moment’s where we thrive

[Chorus]
Drive all night into the dawn
Keep the dream we're holding on
Moon and stars they guide the way
In the dark we'll find the day

[Bridge]
Hearts ablaze under the sky
In the night we learn to fly
Side by side we won't let go
Midnight we'll forever know
title: Midnight Drive
